name: SPUTNIK Launcher
description:
SPUTNIK is a game series about an alternate version of the space race between the Soviet Union and United States of America. Use the SPUTNIK Launcher to play all released games in the series! It'll be updated as more SPUTNIK games are developed.

Games present in the launcher are:

SPUTNIK (2018)

In an alternate version of the year 1957, the Soviet Union launched Sputnik to spread communism to the whole planet via satellite. Spread communism by keeping the radio towers properly aligned.

SPUTNIK 2: Mission L.A.I.K.A. (2019)

Few weeks after using Sputnik to broadcast the USSR anthem to the world, the United States of America is turning capitalist again. Spread communism once more using L.A.I.K.A., a remote controlled soviet robot dog.

SPUTNIK 3: Gagarin Laser (to be developed)

SPUTNIK 4: Operation Red Moon (to be developed)

SPUTNIK 5: The Bonds of Communism (to be developed)
